Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text:
Selsey is located on the south coast approximately 8 miles south of Chichester. Portsmouth is to west, Brighton is to the east, and London is approximately 70 miles north east.

The property is situated on the southern end of the High Street, which is predominantly made up of local traders, however national retailers nearby include Boots, Lloyds Pharmacy and Co-Operative Funeral Care.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
The bank is arranged over ground floor only. The first floor comprises a residential flat, which is not in the banks demise.

Tenure
The property is held on an existing FRI lease due to expire 23/06/2021.

Rent
The passing rent is £12,500 pa exclusive.

Consideration
Offers accepted on the basis of assignment or sub-lease at the passing rent of £12,500 pa.

Rates
We understand from the VOA website that the current rateable value of the property is £7,800 and the rates payable are £3,829. The UBR for 2019/20 is 49.1p. Interested parties are advised to make their own enquiries with the Local Authority for verification purposes.

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text:
Bognor Regis is situated approximately 87 miles (140 km) south west of
London along the A3 and approximately 7 miles (11.26 km) from
Chichester town centre. The subject property is in a prominent location on
London Road surrounded by national retailers such as Halifax, WH Smith,
JD Sports, Morrisons and Burtons.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
The available space comprises ground floor only providing the following
net approximate areas:

Tenure
The premises are available by way of a new full repairing and insuring
lease for a term of 10 years, subject to an upwards only review at the 5th
anniversary of the term.

Rent
£15,000 per annum exclusive.

Rates
We are verbally informed by the Local Rating Authority that the current Rateable Value of the shop is £17,500.00 and the rates payable are £8,155.00 pa. The UBR for 2017/2018 is 46.60p. Interested parties are advised to make their own enquiries with the Local Authority for verification purposes

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text:
Worthing is a large seaside town with borough status in
West Sussex. It is located about 10 miles west of
Brighton and 30 miles south of Crawley.
Retailers within the immediate vicinity include
WH Smith, Caffe Nero and Iceland.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
The premises are comprised of a ground floor banking
hall with offices situated on the first floor. TSB do not
occupy the second and third floors.

Tenure
Leasehold

Rent
£63,250 per annum.

Terms
The property is available by way of assignment with an
existing lease expiry of 20/12/2021.

Rates
We are informed by the Local Rating Authority that the
current Rateable Value of the property is £25,500.

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text:
The premises occupy a mid-terraced position in The Arcade Buildings,
on South Street, Worthing close to the intersection with the towns prime
shopping street; Montague Street. The unit sits immediately adjacent to
Caffe Nero and other surrounding occupiers include Iceland, Ladbrokes
and WHSmith.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
The property comprises ground floor retail accommodation

Tenure
The premises are available by way of an assignment of the existing
lease expiring 17/07/2024.

Rent
£40,000 per annum exclusive.

Rates
We understand that the current Rateable Value is £36,000 and the Rates
Payable are £17,964 per annum. The UBR for 2020/21 is 49.9p.
Interested parties are advised to make their own enquiries with the Local
Authority for verification purposes.

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text:
The property is located on the well-established Boardwater Street West
parade north of Worthing Town Centre.
The property is prominently located with nearby occupiers including Tesco,
Costa Coffee, NatWest and The Broadwater Public House. A street traders
plan is on the reverse of these particulars.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
The premises comprise of a two storey mid-terraced building.

Tenure
The premises are available on a lease due to expire 24 December 2030
subject to a rent review in 2018 and 2028.

Rent
The rent passing is £16,000 per annum exclusive. Incentives are available
subject to covenant status.

Rates
We are verbally informed by the Local Rating Authority that the current Rateable Value of the shop is £27,250.00 and the rates payable are £13,080.00 pa. The UBR for 2018/2019 is 48.00p. Interested parties are advised to make their own enquiries with the Local Authority for verification purposes

Common.FloorPlans.Common.ImageCaption: SHOREHAM BY SEA_ 19 BRUNSWICK ROAD_ BN43 5XD GOAD

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text:
Shoreham by Sea is a seaside town and port in West Sussex. It is located about 7 miles east of Brighton and 7 miles west of Worthing.

The property is situated on the west side of Brunswick Road, at the junction with Western Road. The surrounding properties are mainly in retail use with occupiers being local operators, providing a range of local goods and services.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
The bank is arranged over ground, first and second floors. Ground floor consists of the banking hall, with office space on the upper floors.

Tenure
The property is held on an existing FRI lease due to expire 22/08/2023.

Consideration
Offers accepted on the basis of assignment or sub-lease at the passing rent of £20,250 pa.

Rates
We understand from the VOA website that the current Rateable Value of the shop is £15,750 and the rates payable are £7,733. The UBR for 2019/20 is 49.10p. Interested parties are advised to make their own enquiries with the Local Authority for verification purposes.

Common.Photos.Common.ImageCaption: SHOREHAM BY SEA_ 19 BRUNSWICK ROAD_ BN43 5XD

Dynamic.PrimaryImage.Common.ImageCaption: SHOREHAM BY SEA_ 19 BRUNSWICK ROAD_ BN43 5XD

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text:
Chichester is a predominately residential located within West Sussex in
South West England.
The subject property offers a diverse mix of local retail tenants including
food, convenience and service operators. Nearby occupiers include a
Pharmacy, Butchers and a Co-op.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
The property comprises a ground floor retail situated within a small
parade of local shops. The unit offers an open plan sales area with
amenities to the rear which include two toilets, kitchenette and storage
area.

Tenure
The premises are available by way of an assignment of the existing lease
expiring 31/12/2023.
A copy of the lease is available on request.

Rent
£16,750 per annum exclusive.

Rates
We understand that the current Rateable Value is £7,300 and the Rates
Payable are £3,584.3 per annum. The UBR for 2019/20 is 49.1p.
Interested parties are advised to make their own enquiries with the Local
Authority for verification purposes.

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: Located at the northern point of the South Downs, Storrington is a large village in Horsham District of West Sussex. The nearest train station is in Pulborough or Amberley, both 3 miles away, providing links to Central London. The subject property holds a prominent location on the High Street, close to Old Mill Square Shopping Centre and Waitrose. The village mainly consists of independent retailers, however Boots, Coral and Oxfam are also present.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
The bank is arranged over ground floor only. which consists of the main banking hall, office and ancillary space.

Consideration
The bank is arranged over ground floor only. which consists of the main banking hall, office and ancillary space.

Rent
Offers accepted on the basis of assignment or sub-lease at the passing rent of £16,500 per annum exclusive.

Terms
Prominent frontageConsent for various usesFlexible lease terms available

Rates
We are verbally informed by the Local Rating Authority that the current Rateable Value of the shop is £20,500.00 and the rates payable are £10,065.50 pa. The UBR for 2019/2020 is 49.10p. Interested parties are advised to make their own enquiries with the Local Authority for verification purposes

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text:
East Grinstead is a town in West Sussex, 27 miles south of London and 21
miles northeast of Brighton. It is popular among commuters offering
excellent transport links.
The subject property is situated on the railway approach, which is the main
thoroughfare from the train station to the main shopping street in East
Grinstead. It is opposite an 83-space carpark and next door to an
independently owned micropub. Nearby occupiers are primarily local
independents and small restaurants.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
The property comprises of a ground floor retail unit. The unit offers an
open plan sales area with amenities to the rear which include two
customer toilets, a staff toilet, kitchenette, staff room and an office.

Tenure
Assignment or sublease of the existing lease expiring 24/03/2022.
Alternatively, a new lease via the landlord.

Rent
£17,250 per annum exclusive.

Rates
The rateable value is £10,750.00; however, we understand that the
property benefits from small business rate relief.
Interested parties are advised to make their own enquiries with the Local
Authority for verification purposes.
